messages.title: Three great reasons to vote for Rod Keyes
messages.content: Fight to retain A&E at the PRH, Resist unwelcome development, Save our environment for future generations

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to retain A&E at the PRH
Save our environment for future generations

issues.environment: Save our environment for future generations
issues.health: Fight to retain A&E at the PRH

leaflet.personalStatement: Rod Keyes was born and raised in West Bromwich and now lives in North Shropshire. He studied at Sheffield University before working for a major insurance company for 36 years. He is now retired, but was a union member all his working life, and served as a branch chairman. He has been a governor at two schools, and was Chairman at one of them. He takes part in various recreational activities, and has his own narrowboat. He is married with a grown-up son. If elected, he would be a full-time MP with no other paid distractions or second income!

politicalExperience.achievements: Governor at two schools, Chairman at one.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Published and promoted by Stephen de Launey on behalf of Rod Keyes (Liberal Democrats), both at 20 Mere Grove, Shawbirch, Telford TF5 0NR. Printed by JPL, Unit C3 Coombswood Way, Halesowen B62 8BH
